ca.ciccc.landryachia.model

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ciccc.landryachia.model.Date

  • public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
    Date Class with constructor that takes 3 arguments to create a date object for giving precise calender dates.
    Author:
    Landry Achia
